title: Video: Outfit – Two Islands
content:
Liverpool’s Outfit finally have a video for their debut single on Double Denim Records, Two Islands, a track that was released all the way back in September. Built up of layered ‘moving portraits’, the video is a candid and at times chilling introduction to a selection of humans.

Like the track, it simmers with a brooding energy then breaks dramatically with a sobering and aching level of clarity.

Outfit play London’s Cargo on the 29th of November.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
